creator: Mary Martha Sherwood
description:
LibriVox recording of The Fairchild Family by Mary Martha Sherwood.
Read in English by flutterby93; Beth Thomas; SeekWisdom; Joshua M.C.; Lynne Thompson; Kimberly Collins; ArchaDl; Peter O'Malley; Kathleen Moore; Audrey Giger; Roohi; Rosie Roberts; Lydia; Rachel; Geza Hrazdina; BettyB; Larry Wilson
The adventures of Lucy, Emily and Henry are described in this short novel, written and set in Regency England. Their naughtiness, their activities and their interactions with the children next door; Miss Augusta and Charles Trueman, are all delightfully described. Their daily lives are an insight into childhood at the time - all described in (mostly) very short chapters ideally suited to new readers!
For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
